title: Area/Volume: Radical and exponential part - b

content.description: Let R be the shaded region bounded by the graphs of \(y=\sqrt{x}\) and y = e-3x and the vertical line x = 1, as shown in the figure above.
content.question: Find the volume of the solid generated when R is revolved about the horizontal line y = 1.

frqParts.text: Find the volume of the solid generated when R is revolved about the horizontal line y = 1.

topic.text: 8.12: Volume with Washer Method - Revolving Around Other Axes

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Identify how mathematical characteristics or properties of functions are related in different representations.
